messages.messageBody:
http://skylardude.weebly.com/champ.html

I'm pretty sure he'll be adding more.

BTW, Weebly is great! I forget how we discovered it, but we've been
able to sit down together and create a small website without having to
know much html or anything like that. Which is good, because he
doesn't want to know ANYTHING like that. He just wants a website!

-Heather

messages.subject: Atlantis
messages.msgSnippet: My son has recently moved on from a fascination of sea monsters, to a curiosity about Atlantis.  Does anyone have any good resources for a 9 year old?  Our
messages.messageBody:
My son has recently moved on from a fascination of sea monsters, to a
curiosity about Atlantis. Does anyone have any good resources for a 9
year old? Our library seems to be lacking in books for him.

Oh, and the sea monster fascination IS in fact still alive so I'd take
suggestions on that too! We live and hour or so from Lake Champlain
and he has made a webpage all about Champ!

Thanks in advance!

Heather
